page.title: 10New Barn Park
page.content: New Barn Park is a good place to play ,it has two adventure playgrounds. One for small children which is diesigned like a ship there is also a small enclosure for small children to play in. The larger playground is for older children. There are two helter skelters and a bridge and lots of slides in this playground. There is also a cafe where drinks,sweets and ice-creams can be brought. One of the main features of the park is the boating lake. Where paddle boats and canoes can be hired out.
